comments:
Driver:  0427i

I ran a few Web services scenarios, then I tried invoking a Web service using 
the Web Service Explorer.  It just hangs there and I noticed a 
SAXParseException in the console.  I noticed that the Tomcat 5.0 was not 
started, so I tried starting it but get the SAXParseException again.  The 
workbench then seems to hang and would not respond.

If I stop the workbench and bring it back up, I can now start the server OK.

Here's the SAXParseException:

Hi Kathy,

The stack trace shows the Eclipse internal Tomcat being used
(org.eclipse.tomcat.internal), not my tools. Please move to the correct component.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
Gilbert indicated that this is not containable in M6 so I'm deferring to M8.
